txt.en: A riddle of a memory unfolded before your eyes, as Gandalf faced the most fearsome creature you have ever beheld
This goat will bring you back to the First Hall
You cannot seem to get the Bridge of Khazad-dûm out of your mind....
You have explored the Bridge of Khazad-dûm before leaving Moria, and beheld a memory of Gandalf facing a terrible foe....
The bridge of Khazad-dûm lies in the east of Nud-melek.\n\nYou should walk out onto the Bridge of Khazad-dûm.
This goat will return you to the First Hall in Nud-melek.
A scene unfolds before you on the Bridge of Khazad-dûm.\n\nYou should observe the scene of what came to pass upon the bridge.
The goat you brought here is back a ways, east of the bridge.\n\nYou should return to the goat to head back to the First Hall.
This goat will return you to the First Hall.
Walk out onto the Bridge of Khazad-dûm
Observe what came to pass upon the bridge
Return to the goat to travel back
